div.head: 胎產不下
div.div: failure of a fetus in birth to descend

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: failure of a fetus in birth to descend

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with nan chan 難產 , difficult delivery. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry jiu 酒：婦人 崩中下血，胎產不下 , “[It cures] women experiencing a collapsing center with discharge of blood, and a failure of a fetus in birth to descend ”.
